pullrequest.title: Change to a default CMake build

content.raw:
I think it's fine to make the package a plain cmake package. Eliminates a ROS dependency.

Note for posterity: for development, I think the `catkin_make_isolated` instructions are still valid, even though they are removed by this pull request. I personally find them useful for building lots of packages from source.
